original_text: They had human hands under their wings on the four sides. Each of these four living things had faces and wings that were like this:
korean_text: 그 사방 날개 밑에는 각각 사람의 손이 있더라 그 네 생물의 얼굴과 날개가 이러하니

sentences.original_text: They had human hands under their wings
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 날개 아래에는 사람의 손이 있었고

sentences.original_text: Each of these four living things
